item.ptxt: The procedures listed below are for the LH side.
Other than areas where instructions are provided, use the same procedures for the LH side and RH side.

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 harness clamps with the 2 bolts.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.

s2.ptxt: Install the speed sensor with the bolt.

item.ptxt: Make sure there are no pieces of iron or other foreign matter attached to the sensor tip.
While inserting the speed sensor into the knuckle hole, do not strike or damage the sensor tip.
After installing the speed sensor, make sure there is no clearance or foreign matter between the sensor stay part and the knuckle.
When installing the sensor, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Install the harness clamp with the bolt.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.

s2.ptxt: Install the harness clamp with the bolt.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.
Do not attach the connector to the radiator fan shroud before connecting the connector.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 clamps and the connector.

atten3.ptxt: When attaching the clamps, do not twist the wire harness.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

s2.ptxt: Check the speed sensor signal (See page ).
